settings.text: Receive it in the UK in 1 - 2 business day/s with Express Shipping.CHANGE COUNTRY / SHIPPING AND RETURNS

settings.title: Product details
settings.content:
The oversized 886 hoop earrings are crafted in UK from responsibly sourced precious metals, predominately from recovered and recycled sources. Designed with a subtle inverted profile echoing that of The Royal Mint bullion and a secure, haptic closure the hoops also feature strengthened posts for everyday durability. Available in two sizes including a ‘huggie’, styled worn close to the earlobe.

  • High polish finish
  • Available in two sizes
  • Available in Sterling silver, 9ct and 18ct yellow gold
  • Hallmarked with exclusive Cross Crosslet and Tower mark
  • Delivered in signature gift box, handmade in Italy
  • Travel pouch and polishing cloth included

settings.title: Care Details
settings.content:
• To maintain the radiance of your jewellery, avoid exposure to household bleach and other cleaning products, which can quickly cause discolouration.
  • To clean, gently wipe the surface of your jewellery with a polishing cloth. Avoid commercial liquid polish or “dips”.
  • We recommend that you store your jewellery in a safe place when engaging in these activities: household cleaning, gardening, showering, bathing or swimming and whilst exercising.
  • When not being worn, we recommend that you store your jewellery its original box or a soft lined individual pouch to prevent them being scratched or tangled.
